Name: Mercury
Desc: A Bangboo uninterested in military merits is not a good soldier.

1.Name: Tactical Strategy I: Frontline Suppression
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Mercury summons a vehicle and drives it, unleashing continuous flames at enemies to deal massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

1.Name: Tactical Strategy II: Combat Synergy
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Defense Force</color> characters in your squad: When an Agent deals <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG, Mercury's next <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> gains 22.5% increased DMG. Can stack once every 5s, up to 2 stacks.

2.Name: Tactical Strategy II: Combat Synergy
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 2 <color=#FFFFFF>Defense Force</color> characters in your squad: When an Agent deals <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG, Mercury's next <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> gains 28.1% increased DMG. Can stack once every 5s, up to 2 stacks.

3.Name: Tactical Strategy II: Combat Synergy
3.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Defense Force</color> characters in your squad: When an Agent deals <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG, Mercury's next <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> gains 33.7% increased DMG. Can stack once every 5s, up to 2 stacks.

4.Name: Tactical Strategy II: Combat Synergy
4.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>

5.Name: Tactical Strategy II: Combat Synergy
5.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there's at least 1 <color=#FFFFFF>Defense Force</color> characters in your squad: When an Agent deals <color=#FFFFFF>Aftershock</color> DMG, Mercury's next <color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color> gains 45% increased DMG. Can stack once every 5s, up to 2 stacks.

1.Name: Tactical Strategy III: Explosive Ambush
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Loads itself into the vehicle as ammunition and fires at enemies, detonating on impact and dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
